short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI powered concept explainer and elaborator.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Rabbithole sits on your browser's shoulder, and hops in to dig whenever you want to know more about something. Simply highlight what you want elaboration on while holding down the *shift* key, and a sidebar should pop up telling you exactly what you're missing!

Other features include:
- Dig deeper: so you can dig on the elaboration you just received
- Variable complexity: digs come in Simple, Regular, or Detailed flavors
- ReDig: re-run the same query if you're not happy with the response
